segments.text: I will be accompanying you on your tour today to visit our company . This is the assembly line . These drawings on the wall are process sheets . They describe clearly how each process goes on to the next step .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many workers are there on the lines ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: About 200 . They can assemble at least 3,000 computers every day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , since I came to this company , I was told that high efficiency is essential for the further development .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you control the quality of the products ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , all products have to go through five checks in the whole process . We believe that the quality is the soul of an enterprise . There fore , we always put quality as the first consideration .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , quality is even more than the quantity .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mr . Chandler , this way please . I will show you a five-minute multivision about the history of our company .
segments.speaker: S1
